Blog.post: 2dae...I Woke Up At 12p.m.(as usual)... Went out wif My Cuz, Carmen,Step-mother,Lina And My Sis,Chlo√©... Went 2 The Library First... Out Of The Blue,I picked Up A QUITE Vulgar Book... Went To The Maid Agency Wif 'THEM'.... Came Back 'Bout 9.... First Went To Cold Storage In Katong... Bought A 10kg Pack Of Rice And Some Cheese... Pumped Petrol For The Car... Came Back And Met With A minor Collision... Thank Goodness My Baby Sis, Chloe Was Snuck Up Tightly In Her Car Seat... And Thank Goodness Of Buying The 10kg Bag Of Rice Or else I could have got hurt... As It Pinned Me Down To My Seat... Carmen Suffered VERY small injuries... That's It My Day Written Here...

This Is How My Life Begins Every Day... 2dae I went Out At 'bout 3,went Out To Meet My Stepmum's Friend, Ashley & Her Daughter,Tiffany... She Is A Small And Light Baby... Active,Though... Came Back 'Bout 6.30p.m... Rushed All The Way To Tuition,Finished 'bout 8p.m. After 'dat, went home and had dinner 'bout 8.30. After 'bout 11, came to the Com. to write 'Tis...
This Is How My Life Begins Every Day... The Last 4 Days Were Just Boring So You Don't Literally expect Anithing Frm Me... Just Lay Back 'cause 2morrow, It is Gonna Be A Nice Day...

This Is How My Life Begins Every Day... I Woke Up Early Today 'bout 10a.m... Thank Goodness Today's Vesak Day... Went Out Around 3.30p.m... Went To The Thai Temple In Bedok Called'Palelai Temple'... Man...It Was Filled Wif People But Not Much Of A Big Crowd... Got Some Joss Sticks And Prayed To Buddha And The Four-Faced Buddha... Went To Drop Off My Sis, Chloe To My Grandmother's To Babysit Her... Then Later, We Went Off To Singapore Expo... It was The Last Day Of The Food Exhibition... The Food Was Nice But OK... Went Back 'bout 8p.m. and Wrote This...

This Is How My Life Begins Every Day... I Woke Up At 10a.m. Had NO Breakfast... Had Lunch... Went To My Father's Office To Work.... Went To His Colleage's House And Had Fun... Had Macdonalds For Dinner And Wrote This... How Was Your Day?
This Journal Is Used To Tell About My Daily Life...
